transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Haan ji.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji mam good morning kaise hain aap?
Customer: Very good morning. Theek hu mai aap?
Executive: Main Sindhu baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART ke office se aapke account manager.
Customer: Ji mam bataye.
Executive: Ji ji ji mam aapka profile jo hai wo live ho gaya hai na.
Customer: Ji kal meri Ajay ji se baat hui thi. Actually leads abhi aana start nahi hua hai.
Executive: Leads abhi aana start nahi hui hai. Ek hi lead aayi thi only.
Customer: Ek do aayi hongi aayi hongi. Haan do lead, do lead hum logo ne kal hi unki hai.
Executive: Hai na haan. Abhi yaha pe jaise ki kal Saturday hai, theek hai. To aapko Sunday morning tak aapko leads vagera mil jayengi.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai. 30 weekly wo mil jayengi aur din ki do bonus lead aapko aa jayengi hai na. Theek hai madam. Theek hai. And baki ki cheeze bhi discuss karni thi. And post vagera ke regarding to video mein hum log system pe connect karke usko stream vagera kar du mai aapko?
Customer: Abhi karenge mam? Afternoon mein nahi karenge?
Executive: Nahi aap jab free honge aap mujhe tab bata dijiye na.
Customer: Afternoon mein. Kitne baje tak? 1 baje ke baad.
Executive: 1 baje ke baad.
Customer: 1 pm ke baad.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai mai aapko 1:10, 1:15 tak kar leti hu na.
Customer: Thanks mam.
Executive: Theek hai. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not started yet, only one lead received.

- Wants to schedule a video call in afternoon.



Resolution:

- Executive assured leads will come by Sunday morning.

- Agreed to schedule a video call at 1:10-1:15 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call at 1:10-1:15 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, profile, video call, subscription
